channel.title: Skill Cape Help

item.title: Skill Cape Help
item.dc:creator: @gman035t gman035t
item.description:
@gman035t wrote:

K, So I am trying to add skill capes to my game. Here is what I have gotten so far.

public void capeEmote() {
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 3777) { //attack
stillgfx(346, absY, absX);
stillgfx(427, absY, absX);
stillgfx(83, absY, absX);
txt4 = “An attack skill cape.”;
string4UpdateRequired = true;
}
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 1031) { //strength
stillgfx(482, absY, absX);
stillgfx(481, absY, absX);
stillgfx(246, absY, absX);
txt4 = “A strength skill cape.”;
string4UpdateRequired = true;
}

}

}

}

The error includes something about the interface.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 25, 2007, 06:16:14 PM[/size][hr]Anyone?
